---
title: "Committee"
---

Are you interested in encouraging interdisciplinary collaboration at the intersection of machine learning and geosciences? **Join our committee** to help shape future events and initiatives! Roles are flexible depending on your time constraints. If you are interested please contact one of the committee for more infomation.
